resources.string: No internet connection. Check your connection and try again
The request is not registered in Diia
The requester is not registered in Diia. To protect your personal data, we only send digital copies of documents to those who have registered in Diia.
No documents found for your request
The request contains documents not available in Diia
Attempt limit reached. Please try again later
This is required to verify documents via QR code. It is also needed to compare your photo with the registry data when confirming your identity or signing documents. Diia does not store these photos.
To proceed, please grant Diia access to the camera. This can be done in Settings.
The app needs access to the device\'s camera

string.name: camera_permission_rationale_title
string.u: More details about camera access here

resources.string: Diia may request camera access to verify documents or user data via QR code scanning, create a remote qualified electronic signature, identify a person (by comparing a photo with data from the Unified Demographic Register), and use a qualified remote electronic signature. The camera is not used for any other purposes. By consenting, you confirm these actions.
Grant Diia one-time access to location?

Please grant Diia access to your location to verify your current address. This will allow Diia to verify the accuracy of the address listed as current. Location will not be used for any other purposes.

string.name: location_permission_rationale_title
string.u: More details about location access here

resources.string: Diia may request access to your location to verify the accuracy of the address listed as current. IMPORTANT!!! Location will not be used for any other purposes.
Would you like to receive push notifications from Diia?

To make it easier to receive government services in Diia, please allow push notifications. The app will notify you about assigned fines, court hearings and decisions, credit history requests, new surveys, and the status of ordered services.
You are already logged into the app.
To log in with a different method, you must first log out of the app.
Grant Diia access to file storage
This is required to save receipts, declarations, and applications, as well as to add photos when creating petitions.

string.name: file_permission_rationale_title
string.u: Read more about storage access here

resources.string: Please grant Diia access to external file storage. This is necessary to store copies of documents that confirm the provision of electronic services, as well as to upload photos when creating electronic petitions to local authorities. We use this access only for these purposes and do not share it without your consent. By consenting, you confirm these actions.
You will enter this code to log in to the Diia app.
You will enter this code to sign documents using Diia.Signature.
Make sure you did not make a mistake and remember the code to log in.
Make sure you did not make a mistake and remember the code for Diia.Signature.
To ensure that you are changing the login code
I don\'t remember the login code
I don\'t remember the Diia.Signature code
Try verifying the user identity through your online banking

The new driver's license registry was created in 2013. Of the 9.5 million driver's license holders, photos were displayed for only 2.5 million.

Our IT team managed to obtain quality data from the demographic register and made it possible for 6 million Ukrainians to receive electronic documents.

We will continue to do everything to improve the quality of data and its security in the registries every day. If your license is not displayed, you will receive advice on how to fix it.

A quality vehicle registration certificate registry was created only in 2013.

Therefore, drivers who purchased a vehicle before 2013 but did not perform other registration actions afterward (e.g., gas installation registration, color change, etc.) may not see their documents.

If your vehicle registration certificate is not displayed in the app, you will receive advice on how to fix it.

Press the "Scan" button and place the photo frame on the code on the back of the document.\n\nThe code is located at the bottom of the document card and contains a set of letters, numbers, "<" signs, and your surname and first name in English.
Check your connection and try again
"%s" is not installed on your device
